actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to transfer all compliance and enforcement functions of the Federal Energy Administration to the Secretary of the Treasury.

summary.text: Transfers to the Secretary of the Treasury all compliance and enforcement functions previously vested in the Administrator of the Federal Energy Administration. Stipulates that such transfer of authority shall become effective 60 days after the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to transfer all compliance and enforcement functions of the Federal Energy Administration to the Secretary of the Treasury.
